title: [Bug/Glitch/Error ?] Matchmaking
body:
So after division skipping from s5 - s3 , and now finishing my promos to silver 2 (FOR THE THIRD TIME), I'm matched with a full team of unranked players. (S2 - 0 pts)
Worst part was they were all new players.

It's happened 3 times in a row, every time I finish my promos . The next lobby will be filled with either unranked players or bronze players.

Only message to riot is "what the fuck riot?"

replies.body: >people complaining about the matchmaking system when it is probably the most fair in all games out there

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=WeXqYQf2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-10T05:14:54.529+0000)
>
> 

You're telling me after skipping divisions, being matched with a team of brand new players or worse against a team of high golds is fair?

Shut your mouth if you don't have common sense.

Even if I don't have common sense, at least I'm not directly rude to others.

The matchmaking system has been proven to be the best in practice concerning games like this. Due to the nature of the millions of people who play this, each with their own situations and circumstances, of course there will be hiccups. The point being, these hiccups are not bias to be against you all the time. It's sure easy to ignore the times it favours you, but when it doesn't it really gets under your skin, and I understand that.

If you're better than the people who you are playing with, then *eventually* due to the more matches you're winning, you'll rank up. If you find yourself being matched with people who are apparently lower skilled than you, well, they're based off of your mmr, whether they're ranked or not.

This discussion doesn't belong on this board, however. This is for technical issues with the game. Try gameplay and strategy or even misc.
